title: Warden File
description: The Warden file used for the CLI.

archived.description: Should archived repositories be included in the audit?

scope.description: Which visibility of repos to check. 'public' or 'private' repos only, or 'all'.

names.description: An array of acceptable license slugs, as provided by GitHub.

labels.description: GitHub labels available to the repository.

labelStrategy.description: The theory behind how to audit labels. 'available' - the repo needs to have the labels listed. Any additional labels are fine. 'only' - the repo should only have the labels listed. Additional labels are not okay.
